name: One More Time (PatheticGamer)
description:
Beta-demo-build of my upcoming game "ONE MORE TIME"! 

This time it will be a complete, STORY-BASED game! 

Controls: (in house)

Arrows - movement (Up/Down to select dialogue options); Space - jump; E - interact; X - scroll  dialogue (and confirm the answer)

Another controls for different in-game scenarious can be found via reading dialogues (don't worry - just choose another respond to a dialogue - that can help you)

Enjoy!
